text: @realDonaldTrump So what's left of this crippled USA as if Covid19 wasn't enough on us American People with no Job's we spent 3 months closed up these Jobs won't be back now the violence that are being allowed from these Politicians in these State's what's next for the US that will finish us

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
